scenario: High-frequency sequential GET requests with minimal delays, targeting multiple suspicious paths in rapid succession.

patterns.pathSequence: mixed API paths, including sensitive endpoints (/admin/dashboard) and search queries

reasoning: The rapid succession of requests (avg <0.1s between them) with a focus on data-intensive endpoints (users, products) and suspicious paths (admin, logout) strongly indicates automated scraping. The lack of delays between requests and consistent UA suggests a scripted bot rather than human behavior. The inclusion of invalid tokens (403) and search queries hints at data extraction attempts.
